name: 電腦科學教學法
description: This course provides students with a basic introduction to computer science education research in terms of instructional methods. Students will learn various instructional methods and corresponding pedagogical theories, based on which they will be able to design feasible instructional methods for computer science subjects. Students will also have the ability to evaluate diverse instructional methods and propose solutions for improving them.
